info.text: I stole the key to the elevator, and I'll only give it back if you give me research samples.
If you tattle on me to Ms.Hernandez I'll bully you and you won't be my friend anymore.
[query]Give the meanie-head research samples?data*prTESTES_TISSUE,prEPIDIDYMIS_TISSUE;You do not have the needed samples.
[bishan.ml and Juan Inc. do not approve of bullying of any kind]
I'm sorry for being mean to you, I'll teach about the Reproductive System as an apology.
There are different major organs in the reproductive system based on sex. Males have testes,
epididymis, vas deferens, a prostate, a seminal vesicle, a urethra, and a penis. Females have
ovaries, fallopian tubes, a uterus, a vagina, and breasts. The reproductive systems job is to
create gametes through meiosis, which allow organisms to pass on their genes.
The elevator that you're going in goes up to parts of the Endocrine System. Did you know that
The reproductive system and the endocrine system interact with each other all the time.
The endocrine system creates hormones and releases them into the bloodstream.
These hormones then affect reproductive behavior and the development of the body including the reproductive system.
